Guided bicycle tours in the Mjøsa-region.

With us you can take a new aproach to the many museums and lovely landscape around the lake of Mjøsa.

We offer daytrips in the area around most of the Skibladner harbourtowns, Hamar, Gjøvik, Lillehammer and Eidsvoll. As well as packagetrips with multiple locations, where you can travel from town to town by bicycle, with Skibladner, or a combination.

An ecofriendly aproach to experiencing the wonders around the lake of Mjøsa.

Daytrips and customizable packagetrips over several days.

You get to experience a lot of norwegian history.

Both local and national history in our options.
